overview:
Nephzat Technologies is a professional software development company provides affordable web and mobile application services to big and small companies. Our strength lies in designing and creating large web applications to enable your organization to deploy internet technology in a profitable manner.

Nephzat specialize in software and web application development services such as PHP software Development, Mobile website development, Web design and graphics, Flash application development, Ecommerce application development, Content management systems development, Application support and maintenance plus.

Nephzat High Definition Flash Video Player

Nephzat HD FLV player is a free video player for embedding videos in web pages; It allows you to play videos on your websites in style with high quality. All high definition flash videos will be streamed in a most revolutionary way with the free HD FLV player. It supports all the features youâ€™ll possibly need and the features can be configured the way you like.

Nephzat is proud to introduce Nephzat HD FLV player 1.0 which is packed with tons of features. Nephzat HD FLV player 1.0 reads really everything flash can handle: .FLV, .M4A, .MP4, .M4V, .MOV, .MP4V, .F4V files. It is free to use for both non-profit and commercial websites.unlike other videoplayer, Nephzat HD FLV player 1.0 has a different approach on providing the control of your videos.

Look at the link http://www.nephzat.com/products/flash/nephzat-free-hd-flv-player/features.html for more features
